activities.loc: Courtroom D, Fourth Floor - North Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

8:64 AM Prosecuting attorney David S Olson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jeffrey Allen Mahalick appeared by video.  Attorney Michael Shannon Murphy appeared by video for Jeffrey Allen Mahalick. Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information. Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived. Defendants Attorney pleads not guilty and jury trial to be set.

4:04 PM Prosecuting attorney Alexander David Goulart and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jeffrey Allen Mahalick appeared by video, in custody from the Rock County Jail.  Attorney Michael Shannon Murphy not in court. Matter continued for Attorney to be present.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Activity: Initial appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

3:15 PM Prosecuting attorney David S Olson and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jeffrey Allen Mahalick appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Taylor E Klokow appeared by video for attorney Michael Murphy for Jeffrey Allen Mahalick. Address updated. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Cash bond set of $500.00 with conditions. Matter continued to an adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 3PM for attorney Murphy to appear.
